si.title: පොල්තෙල් මිල වැඩි කිරීම
body_lines: පොල්තෙල් ලීටරයක මිල රුපියල් 100 කට වඩා වැඩි කර තිබේ. ජාතික පාරිභෝගික පෙරමුණ (එන්.සී.එෆ්) පැවසුවේ අද (17) බවයි.
පොල්තෙල් ලීටරයක පිරිවැය 180 සහ රු.. 200. එහි සභාපති අසේලා සම්පත් පවසන්නේ රුපියල අතර වැඩිවීම වැඩි වී ඇති බවයි.  ஒரு லீற்றர் தேங்காய் எண்ணெய்யின் தற்போதைய சில்லறை விலை ரூ. 550 කි

en.title: Increase in the price of coconut oil
body_lines: The price of a liter of coconut oil has been increased by more than 100 rupees. The National Consumer Front (NCF) said today (17).

The cost of a liter of coconut oil is 180 and Rs.. ௨௦௦. Its chairman Asela Sampath says the increase in between the rupee has been increased.  ஒரு லீற்றர் தேங்காய் எண்ணெய்யின் தற்போதைய சில்லறை விலை ரூ. Is 550

summary_lines: The price of coconut oil has risen by over 100 rupees per liter, reaching 550 rupees, according to the National Consumer Front. This increase is attributed to fluctuations in the currency exchange rate.
